mapper.select: select a.BUYERPROD_ID, B.LGU_NAME as buyerprod_name from (select * from hstock order by BUYERPROD_ID) a inner join lgu b on a.BUYERPROD_ID = b.lgu_id

INSERT INTO MENU(MENU_ID,MENU_NAME,MENU_PRICE,MENU_TEXT,MENU_DATE,MENU_TYPE) VALUES( #{menuId}, #{menuName}, #{menuPrice}, #{menuText}, TO_DATE(#{menuDate},'YYYY/MM/DD'), #{menuType} )

select max(attatch_no)+1 from attatch
INSERT INTO attatch(ATTATCH_ORGNAME, ATTATCH_SAVENAME, ATTATCH_MIME, ATTATCH_SIZE, TABLE_NAME, TABLE_PK, ATTATCH_NO, THUMB_IMG) VALUES( #{originalFilename}, #{menuImg}, 'img', 0, 'MENU', #{menuId}, #{attatchNo}, #{menuThumbImg} )
mapper.select: select menu_id, menu_name, menu_price, menu_date, menu_text, menu_type, menu_material, thumb_img as menu_thumb_img from (SELECT A.MENU_ID, A.MENU_NAME, A.MENU_PRICE, TO_CHAR(A.MENU_DATE,'YYYY/MM/DD') AS MENU_DATE, A.MENU_TEXT, A.MENU_TYPE, LISTAGG(C.LGU_NAME,', ') WITHIN GROUP (ORDER BY C.LGU_NAME) AS MENU_MATERIAL FROM MENU A, MATERIAL B, LGU C WHERE A.MENU_ID=B.MENU_ID AND B.BUYERPROD_ID= C.LGU_ID GROUP BY A.MENU_ID, A.MENU_NAME, A.MENU_PRICE, A.MENU_TEXT, A.MENU_TYPE, A.MENU_DATE, TO_CHAR(A.MENU_DATE,'YYYY/MM/DD') ORDER BY A.menu_date DESC) a inner join attatch b on a.menu_id = b.table_pk
